Question
========
What is a pull request (PR)?

Answerlist
----------
* A request to merge your changes into another repository or branch
* A way to delete a branch remotely
* A method for downloading a repository without cloning
* A tool for changing GitHub account settings

Solution
========
A pull request asks the repository owner to merge your changes.

Answerlist
----------
* True
* False
* False
* False
